gunk generate ./util -v -x

-- go.mod --
module testdata.tld/util

require (
	github.com/gunk/opt v0.0.0-20190514110406-385321f21939
)
-- v1/go/.empty --
-- v1/python/.empty --
-- v1/java/.empty --
-- v1/csharp/.empty --
-- v1/js/.empty --
-- v1/php/.empty --
-- v1/ruby/.empty --
-- v1/cpp/.empty --
-- v1/objc/.empty --
-- .gunkconfig --
[generate go]
out=v1/go
plugin_version=v1.4.3

[generate python]
out=v1/python

[generate java]
out=v1/java

[generate csharp]
out=v1/csharp

[generate js]
out=v1/js

[generate php]
out=v1/php

[generate ruby]
out=v1/ruby

[generate cpp]
out=v1/cpp

[generate objc]
out=v1/objc
-- util/util.gunk --
package util

import (
	"github.com/gunk/opt/http"
	"github.com/gunk/opt/service"
)

// Message is a Echo message.
type Message struct {
	// Msg holds a message.
	Msg  string `pb:"1" json:"msg"`
	Code int    `pb:"2" json:"code"`
}

// Util is a utility service.
type Util interface {
	// Echo echoes a message.
	//
	// +gunk http.Match{
	//		Method:	"POST",
	// 		Path:	"/v1/echo",
	// 		Body:	"*",
	//	}
	Echo(Message) Message
}
